Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Svc. Dist. No. 2 -- 4.75 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
HOSPITAL SERVICE DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION
 (TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 4.75 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE HOSPITAL FACILITIES OF THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 2 of the Parish of St. Martin, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a four and seventy-five hundredths (4.75) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $221,635) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the hospital facilities of the District?
